description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.s5G3xc03RN6Vmwza]{Icon}

You are famous enough that pretty much everyone has either heard of you or can quickly find information about you (it’s a DC 10 @Check[type:culture] to recognize your name and a DC 20 Culture check for someone to recognize you out of context from your appearance alone). Among those who follow your iconic profession, you’ve built up both fans and detractors due to your celebrity. If you’re looking for a generic person like “a doctor who can treat this disease,” you can almost always find one who’s a fan and whose attitude starts as friendly or helpful to you; this takes [[/r 2d4]]{2d4 hours}. At the GM’s discretion, fans might give you services (although not goods) for a discount or even for free.
